sourcesContent:
<template>
  <a-drawer
      :title="title"
      :width="800"
      placement="right"
      :closable="false"
      @close="close"
      :visible="visible"
  >

    <a-spin :spinning="confirmLoading">
      <a-form :form="form">
      
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="主键id">
          <a-input-number v-decorator="[ 'iId', validatorRules.iId ]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="详情页面路径（项目文件存放目录）">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入详情页面路径（项目文件存放目录）" v-decorator="['sPagePath', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="附件表id">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入附件表id" v-decorator="['iFileId', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="页面名称">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入页面名称" v-decorator="['sPageName', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="业务归类（1.信息发布、2.公文审批、3.事务审批、4.业务审批）">
          <a-input-number v-decorator="[ 'iPapeType', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="页面模板概要说明">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入页面模板概要说明" v-decorator="['sPageRemarks', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="是否可以管理视频文件(1、0)">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入是否可以管理视频文件(1、0)" v-decorator="['iIsVideo', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="是否包含主送、抄送、传阅(1、0)">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入是否包含主送、抄送、传阅(1、0)" v-decorator="['iIsSend', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="是否包含抄报(1、0)">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入是否包含抄报(1、0)" v-decorator="['iIsCopy', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="是否是VIP模板(1、0)">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入是否是VIP模板(1、0)" v-decorator="['iIsVip', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="创建者">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入创建者" v-decorator="['sCreateBy', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="创建时间">
          <a-date-picker showTime format='YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss' v-decorator="[ 'dCreateTime', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="修改者">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入修改者" v-decorator="['sUpdateBy', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="修改时间">
          <a-date-picker showTime format='YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss' v-decorator="[ 'dUpdateTime', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
		
      </a-form>
    </a-spin>
    <a-button type="primary" @click="handleOk">确定</a-button>
    <a-button type="primary" @click="handleCancel">取消</a-button>
  </a-drawer>
</template>

<script>
  import { httpAction } from '@/api/manage'
  import pick from 'lodash.pick'
  import moment from "moment"

  export default {
    name: "BusPageModal",
    data () {
      return {
        title:"操作",
        visible: false,
        model: {},
        labelCol: {
          xs: { span: 24 },
          sm: { span: 5 },
        },
        wrapperCol: {
          xs: { span: 24 },
          sm: { span: 16 },
        },

        confirmLoading: false,
        form: this.$form.createForm(this),
        validatorRules:{
        iId:{rules: [{ required: true, message: '请输入主键id!' }]},
        },
        url: {
          add: "/oaBus/busPage/add",
          edit: "/oaBus/busPage/edit",
        },
      }
    },
    created () {
    },
    methods: {
      add () {
        this.edit({});
      },
      edit (record) {
        this.form.resetFields();
        this.model = Object.assign({}, record);
        this.visible = true;
        this.$nextTick(() => {
          this.form.setFieldsValue(pick(this.model,'iId','sPagePath','iFileId','sPageName','iPapeType','sPageRemarks','iIsVideo','iIsSend','iIsCopy','iIsVip','sCreateBy','sUpdateBy'))
		  //时间格式化
          this.form.setFieldsValue({dCreateTime:this.model.dCreateTime?moment(this.model.dCreateTime):null})
          this.form.setFieldsValue({dUpdateTime:this.model.dUpdateTime?moment(this.model.dUpdateTime):null})
        });

      },
      close () {
        this.$emit('close');
        this.visible = false;
      },
      handleOk () {
        const that = this;
        // 触发表单验证
        this.form.validateFields((err, values) => {
          if (!err) {
            that.confirmLoading = true;
            let httpurl = '';
            let method = '';
            if(!this.model.id){
              httpurl+=this.url.add;
              method = 'post';
            }else{
              httpurl+=this.url.edit;
               method = 'put';
            }
            let formData = Object.assign(this.model, values);
            //时间格式化
            formData.dCreateTime = formData.dCreateTime?formData.dCreateTime.format('YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss'):null;
            formData.dUpdateTime = formData.dUpdateTime?formData.dUpdateTime.format('YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss'):null;
            
            console.log(formData)
            httpAction(httpurl,formData,method).then((res)=>{
              if(res.success){
                that.$message.success(res.message);
                that.$emit('ok');
              }else{
                that.$message.warning(res.message);
              }
            }).finally(() => {
              that.confirmLoading = false;
              that.close();
            })



          }
        })
      },
      handleCancel () {
        this.close()
      },


    }
  }
</script>

<style lang="less" scoped>
/** Button按钮间距 */
  .ant-btn {
    margin-left: 30px;
    margin-bottom: 30px;
    float: right;
  }
</style>
